Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Weizbao Network is a leader in new generation distributed data storage solutions, focusing on building secure, efficient and compliant enterprise-level data infrastructure. The company provides full lifecycle services from data preprocessing, encrypted storage to compliance auditing for global top 500 enterprises in the fields of finance, healthcare, satellite remote sensing and so on.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: We want to store software source code and information material library.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use go-ipfs-car to package data into car files. And we configure unixfsv1.5 format to support single object storage for files larger than 4GB. ipfs-car --pack path/to/data --output wrapped.car
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
